top_comments.comment: Last week I was at Costco grabbing organic almond milk and got stopped by a guy asking me why am I not getting the Costco almond milk since it’s Bobby approved. I am so happy that more and more people watch your videos and talk to each other at Costco, so cool😄

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'm a BIG Costco fan.  Costco gets more of my monies than any place else.  This channel is really beneficial in helping me to do better shopping.
What part of the ocean are they caught?  Could be near Japan's  contamination from nuclear power plant.
